DOC.detailed_description: Background : Behavioural psychological symptom dementia ( BPSD ) often report institution elderly . Objective : To evaluate effectiveness staff education intervention manage BPSD old people diagnosis dementia . Methods : The trial conduct 16 nursing home ; 306 patient diagnosis dementia present BPSD select . Nursing home randomly allocate intervention group control group . An eight-week staff education training programme conduct nursing home intervention group . The main outcome measure Cohen-Mansfield Agitation Inventory ( CMAI ) observation scale score . Assessments do baseline ( W0 ) , end 'intervention ' period ( W8 ) 12 week ( W20 ) .
